Distill

The Essence of Development

August 7-8, 2014 â€¢ San Francisco, CA

Distill, a conference on the essence of development, will bring together creators, builders and innovators from the technology world to learn from each other and work together on solutions for a better future in technology and beyond. Learn more

Speakers

30 creators and trail blazers to excite, educate and inspire you.

Ben Huh

Founder & CEO • Cheezburger

Making the World Happy for Five Minutes a Day

Danae Ringelmann

Founder & Chief Development Officer • Indiegogo

Dylan Richard

CTO • Modest, Inc.

Harper Reed

CEO • Modest, Inc.

Two Developers, Many Lines of Code, and A Campaign that Made History

Chief Performance Officer • Fastly

The Perception of Speed

Blithe Rocher

Jen Myers

Shepherding Unicorns: How to Be a Good Web Mentor

Jessica Kerr

Developer • Outpace Systems

Property-Based Testing for Careful Code

It'll Be Amazing

Distill will take place at the Palace of Fine Arts where you will experience stellar content in an inspirational and iconic setting. In addition, there will be ample opportunity to hang out with your fellow attendees amidst specialty coffee, local delicacies, libations, games and more.
